issue.title: www.emag.ro
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.emag.ro/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.emag.ro%2F) ### Comment > Hi! Please include this site as a false positive: https://www.emag.ro/ The main banners are not showing, when logged in my account, on a PC if Adguard protection is ON. This is a online store and they have great offers on that main banners and I would like to see it, in my browsers. I even used a reset on my PC for Adguard to cancel a hidden rule but it still not showing anything. > > Also, I think that it would be great that the Adguard assistant settings to also have a Unblock ad on this website option. I my case if I did push, by mistake, pushed the Block ad on this website and clicked on the main banner region I could easy and without any special knowledge undo my problem. That is why I've used the Adguard reset on my PC, but that did not worked. > > I saw that when I order something, sometimes when the pay section of the site is on display, on PC the screen is just white and I can't finish to process my payments. This I don't know if it's because of Adguard or not but it just became a problem in the past week, out of the blue. > > Thank you. Have a good day! ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/8d9w10V.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/9v1ISE3.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.10.2 Browser: | Chrome AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media Userscripts: | https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/assistant/4.3/assistant.user.js,
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js,
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js Referrer: | [https://www.emag.ro/history/shoppingdetails/265563020](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.emag.ro%2Fhistory%2Fshoppingdetails%2F265563020)

issue.title: dmagazine.docomo.ne.jp
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://dmagazine.docomo.ne.jp/list/1A21/20c58199aefaaba312642c886bc11fcb21bb7777395ea82659544c866770daa6/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdmagazine.docomo.ne.jp%2Flist%2F1A21%2F20c58199aefaaba312642c886bc11fcb21bb7777395ea82659544c866770daa6%2F) ### Comment Username: @dokurocker > dブックご対応ありがとうございました。 > dマガジンもURLが変更になっており、下記のホワイトリストが無効になっています。 > dmkt-sp.jp#@#.ad-button > dmkt-sp.jp#@#.ad-cover > dmkt-sp.jp#@#.ad-label > > dmagazine.docomo.ne.jpに対して、ホワイトリストの追加をお願いします。 > > 関連issue、pull request： > #129495 > #105183 > easylist/easylist#10348 > easylist/easylist#13321 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/1KgcTqu.png)
